TextView.android:text: Special thanks to Chris Cerrito for collaboration on how to implement effectively implement and use Memorization State and verse packs, creative counseling, support, and encouragement. Special thanks to my girlfriend Lauren Green, for help selecting theme colors, general creative counseling, and continuing support and encouragement. Special thanks to all my friends and family who have given me support and encouragement at every step along the way. And utmost thanks to our God in Heaven, for without His salvation and the work He has done in my life, I would never have become a programmer and this app would not exist.

The included verse packs with the following names were created by Chris Cerrito and Hickory Harvest Church:\nwww.chriscerrito.com www.hickoryharvest.com\nGod's Holiness, Man's Depravity, Share the Gospel, The Command of Christ, The Person of Christ, The Work of Christ, Help with Anger, Help with Despair, Help with Fear
